subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Detroit is the eighth N.H.L. team to erase a 3-0 series deficit, and on Thursday in San Jose it is seeking to become the fourth to win the series.
snippet: Detroit is the eighth N.H.L. team to erase a 3-0 series deficit, and on Thursday in San Jose it is seeking to become the fourth to win the series.
